bibl.title: Funerary Artists. The Textual Evidence.
bibl.note: The artists involved. - Location of workshops and artists' place of residence. - Apprenticeship. - Working practice. - Provision and acquisition of materials and their cost. - Artists' economic and fiscal position. - Guilds. - Gender and ethnicity. - Conclusion.
